column4: Do I need to (or should I) use any particular configure -- flags when building gtk+ on Lucid? (apart from the reccomendation in the gtk+ documentation to pass --with-libjasper if I want JPEG2000 support).
don't know if you'd want this or not, but a lot of time i make --prefix=/usr
you might want to use the 'checkinstall' package to actually install
checkinstall will run a 'make install' command to build a custom ubuntu package... it makes a .deb file
